name: Which Symbol do I Catch?
description:
There are different items falling down and you need to catch the correct one but avoid touching the others.

Move the catcher left and right with your mouse.

Pause the game using Esc

Which one is the correct one? Look at the symbol on your catcher and catch the circle with the same symbol on it. The circle must fall in the middle of your catcher.

The correct symbol to catch will change unexpectedly.

The more correct catches, the higher your score.

If you touch the wrong circle, you lose a life.

Lose all your lives and you're done.
